Lyric:
[by:里了一眼]
[00:17]There are places I remember all my life 
[00:24]though some have changed
[00:26]some forever not for better
[00:29]some have gone and some remain
[00:35]all these places have their moments
[00:39]with lovers and friends I still can recall
[00:43]some are dead and some are living
[00:48]in my life I love them all
[00:56]there all these friends and lovers 
[01:00]there is no one compares with you
[01:05]and these memories lose their meaning
[01:08]when I think of love as something new
[01:13]though I know I'll never lose affection
[01:18]for people and things that went before
[01:22]I know I often stop and think about them
[01:26]in my life I love you more
[01:31]emmm.......
[01:39]emmm.......
[01:48]though I know I'll never lose affection
[01:52]for people and things that went before
[01:56]I know I often stop and think about them
[02:01]in my life I LOVE YOU MORE
[02:10]IN MY LIFE I LOVE YOU MORE~
